lost-and-founder.title_long: Lost and Founder: A Painfully Honest Field Guide to the Startup World
lost-and-founder.author: Rand Fishkin
lost-and-founder.description_syllabus: Lost and Founder is available in print and ebook editions, and should cost less than $10 for the Kindle edition

venture-deals.title_long: Venture Deals: Be Smarter Than Your Lawyer and Venture Capitalist
venture-deals.author: Brad Feld, Jason Mendelson
venture-deals.description_syllabus: You should be able to read Venture Deals online at no charge by going to the UW Libraries databases list and choosing O'Reilly
